body.name: JIZHI Baby Doll Pack n Play Crib for Girls Foldable Doll Playpen Toy for 18" Dolls with Storage Bag, Pink
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 21 hrs 9 mins
features: [Foldable and Easy to Install]:Collapses neatly and comes with a zippered storage bag, perfect for "on the go" play. Easy to assemble and requires no tools, so your little one can put the reborn doll down for a nap in no time.
[Product Dimensions]:Expand Size：52*31*31cm(20.5"*12.2"*12.2"), Folded size: 35*11cm*11cm (13.7*4.3*4.3inch), Ideal for dolls up to 22 inches.

[Great Gift for Kids]:The Portable real baby doll playpen bed is a lovely accessory for all doll lovers, and the doll bed accessories makes a great gift for any occasion, recommended for ages 3 and up. Promotes imaginative pretend play! (DOLL NOT INCLUDED).
[Good Material]: Made of environmentally friendly ABS material, metal base and frame construction, providing long-lasting strength and use, ensuring safe play for little ones.

[Eye-Catching Design]:This reborn doll Pack n Play comes in a kid-friendly bright pink color with cute heart graphic, making it the perfect gift for your little princess. Baby doll accessory set makes it a fun addition.

[Size Tips]: If your baby doll is 22 inches, please confirm his leg type. Our doll crib is suitable for 22-inch curved-legged dolls, and straight-legged ones may not be suitable. If it is a doll under 22 inches, please feel free to buy it.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Reborn baby doll Pack n Play bed for little girls A perfect gift for your little princess. Role playing pretend play baby doll accessories set makes it a fun addition.

Doll beds for 18 inch dolls --Suitable for doll size: it can accommodate up to 20-inch dolls, and 18-inch dolls are recommended! --Style: cute, fashion --Use crowd: children, little girls, little boys --Suitable for 3 years old + --Product unfolded size: 52(L)*31(W)*31(H)cm/20.5(L)*12.2(W)*12.2(H)inch. --Product folded size: 35(L)*11(W)*11(H)cm/13.7(L)*4.3(W)*4.3(H)inch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars For my dog
reviews.reviewText: Nice size for a small dog

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars My daughter plays with it every day
reviews.reviewText: My two year old daughter loved this play pen as soon as we opened it! She had real one as a baby and her baby brother has one too. It was very easy to put together, it took like 10 minutes. The play pen itself is not too sturdy and the quality is okay. On occasion, when my baby boy get upset he kicks it and it comes apart. It's very easy to out together though. My daughter loves putting her baby dolls to sleep in there and rocks them to bed, so that is what is important.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Adorable baby doll pack n play
reviews.reviewText: Baby Girl loves playing mommy and this was a must have for her little family of dolls. She uses it for all of her babies and even her stuffies at times. She has a couple of larger babies, about 20 inches, and they seem to fit pretty well. It is fairly easy to put together but easier if you do it before giving it to your child. Meaning it is easier to assemble without your little helper!!! It comes with a thin pad to go into the bottom, which is easily attached. We liked the carrying bag but have not actually folded it up to see if it fits. The colors are bright and colorful and the quality is as good as any of these toys like this. Overall, I think this is a good buy and an excellent toy for the little mommy in your life!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars For tiny kids
reviews.reviewText: My daughter was to big for it she’s a 8 yr old this isMore like 4/5 yr old

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is the perfect size for a 12-16 inch doll. It looks like a real one but obviously small. It folds easily and makes playing house for little ones fun! She can pack up her pack and play and take it on the go. My 6 year old can set it up and fold it up on her own. It is good quality and sturdy enough for a baby doll. It comes with a carrying case and also came in a box so makes for easy wrapping!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dreamy Playtime Haven: The Perfect Doll Crib for Little Ones!
reviews.reviewText: The JIZHI Baby Doll Pack n Play Crib is an absolute delight! Its pink color and foldable design make it both adorable and practical. Perfectly sized for 18" dolls, it's become a favorite play spot for my little one's dolls. The added storage bag is a thoughtful bonus, keeping all doll accessories organized. It's sturdy yet lightweight, making it easy to move around. A fantastic toy that encourages imaginative play and provides endless hours of fun!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars give your dolls a rest!
reviews.reviewText: very cute little portable pack-n-play for dolls.we loved the bright colors and the fact that almost all our dolls (of all different sizes) fit into this!it can get a tad bit frustrating while assembling, as when you go to assemble one part, the other parts seem to pop off, but with a little persistence, we got it done in a few minutes!it's pretty sturdy, and the carrying-case is a nice addition!
